data – Build data cache¶

data.base¶

class orca.data.base.IOBase(cachedir, debug_on=True)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for data savers/loaders.

Parameters:cachedir (str) – Cache diretory path

Note

This is a base class and should not be used directly.

__metaclass__¶

alias of ABCMeta

set_debug_mode(debug_on)[source]¶

Enable/Disable debug level message in data savers/loaders. This is enabled by default.

debug(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level DEBUG on the data logger.

info(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level INFO on the data logger.

warning(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level WARNING on the data logger.

error(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level ERROR on the data logger.

critical(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level CRITICAL on the data logger.

save(name, data, **kwargs)[source]¶

Override (mandatory) to save data.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – File name of the saved data on disk
  • data – The data to be saved
Raises:

NotImplementedError
delete(fname)[source]¶

Override (mandatory) to delete data.

Parameters:fname (str) – File name on disk
Raises:NotImplementedError
load(name, **kwargs)[source]¶

Override (mandatory) to load data.

Parameters:name (str) – File name of the saved data on disk
Raises:NotImplementedError
class orca.data.base.SaverBase(cachedir, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: orca.data.base.IOBase

Base class for data savers.

Note

This is a base class and should not be used directly.

load(name, **kwargs)[source]¶

This method should never be called by a data saver.

Raises:NotImplementedError
delete(fname)[source]¶

Simple-minded file deletion. Override (mandatory) for any non plain file formats.

__setitem__(key, val)[source]¶

Covenient helper special method.

Parameters:val – When it is None, this is equivalent to deleting the data file with name key
__delitem__(key)[source]¶

Convenient helper special method.

Bases: orca.data.base.IOBase

Base class for data loaders.

Note

This is a base class and should not be used directly.

configure(**kwargs)[source]¶

Method to pass parameters to file parse function internally used.

save(name, data, **kwargs)[source]¶

This method should never be called by a data loader.

Raises:NotImplementedError

This method should never be called by a data loader.

Raises:NotImplementedError
__getitem__(key)[source]¶

Convenient helper function. This avoids loading the data from disk over and over again.
